info.objective_text: Be the first player (or duo) to move their pawn to space 10 on the board.
info.turn_text: On your turn, you can play effect cards freely and must follow the rule below for value cards. Then, pass the turn.
info.value_card_rule_1: If you have 2 or more value cards in hand, you MUST play exactly one per turn.
info.value_card_rule_2: If you have only 1 value card, you CANNOT play it. It will be locked to be used as your "Rest".
info.value_card_rule_3: The value card you play becomes your new "Rest" for the next round.
info.end_of_round_text: The round ends when all players pass their turn consecutively. The score is calculated, and pawns move.
info.end_of_round_rule_1: Winner(s): Advance 1 space. In case of a tie, no one advances.
info.end_of_round_rule_2: 'Up'/'Down' Effects: Move your pawn up or down.
info.end_of_round_rule_3: 'More'/'Less' Effects: Add or subtract your "Rest" value from your score.
info.special_card_pula: Jump: Forces an opponent to move their pawn to an empty path on the board.
info.special_card_reversus: Reversus: Inverts an effect ('More' becomes 'Less', 'Up' becomes 'Down', etc.) on a single player.
info.special_card_reversus_total: Reversus Total: The most powerful card. It inverts ALL effects on ALL players for the round (Global effect). It can also be used to apply and lock a basic effect ('More', 'Less', etc.) on a single target for one round (Individual effect).
info.field_effects_text: Stopping on colored spaces on the board activates special effects that last for the entire round!
info.credits_line_1: The game "Reversus" was created by Xael in 2023 with the theme "Race to the Altar" as a Card + Board Game, to raise funds for his wedding - and now we are on version 3.0 (08/21/2025) with many new features!
info.credits_line_2: Enjoy all the modes and functionalities:
info.credits_line_4: My special thanks to everyone who supported this project from the beginning.
info.conduct_title: Rules of Conduct and Reasons for Banning
info.conduct_intro: The user agrees not to engage in the following actions within the game, under penalty of suspension or permanent banning of the account:
info.conduct_item1_text: Use of profanity, insults, threats, harassment, or any type of discrimination (race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, etc.).
info.conduct_item2_text: Actions that cause discomfort to other players, including stalking, persistent messaging, or abusive behavior.
info.conduct_item3_text: Attempted fraud, scams, money laundering, sharing of illegal information, or malicious links.
info.conduct_item4_text: Use of hacks, cheats, bots, macros, or any resource that provides an unfair advantage over other players.
info.conduct_item5_text: Massive sending of messages, advertisements, external links, or any type of unauthorized marketing in the game.
info.conduct_item6_text: Commercialization, loan, or sharing of the account with third parties without official authorization.
info.conduct_item7_title: Use of inappropriate language in chat and official channels:
info.conduct_item7_text: Including any sexually explicit content, gore, incitement to hatred, or violent speech.
info.privacy_intro: By using the game, the user declares to be aware of and in agreement with the following points:
info.privacy_item1_text1: The game may collect information such as email, nickname, chat message logs, and in-game interactions.
info.privacy_item1_text2: This data is used to ensure security, prevent fraud, enforce the rules of conduct, and improve the user experience.
info.privacy_item2_title: Access to messages and internal communications
info.privacy_item2_text1: The game team may access chats and internal emails when there is a report or suspicion of a rules violation, always respecting the GDPR.
info.privacy_item2_text2: No communication will be shared with third parties without consent, except when required by law.
info.privacy_item3_text: The player can request the deletion of their personal data at any time, aware that this may result in the permanent closure of the account.
info.privacy_item4_text: By creating an account and continuing to use the game, the user fully agrees with these rules and privacy policies.

story_dialogue.start_necroverso_text: Hello stranger... welcome! You are in the Inversus and I am the Necroverso. If you wish to return to your world, you must challenge the sovereigns of this place...
story_dialogue.pre_tutorial_prompt_text: Yes, through a duel! They play a card and board game called REVERSUS. Would you like me to teach you the basics in a match?
story_dialogue.tutorial_skip_text: You are probably a prodigy... Good luck then. Face Contravox.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_1_text: Great. The main rule is: have the highest score at the end of the round to advance on the board. Simple, right?
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_2_text: Your score is the sum of two VALUE cards you play. If you have 2 or more value cards, you MUST play one. If you only have one, it's saved for the next round, your last value play will be your "Rest".
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_3_text: EFFECT cards can change everything! "More" and "Less" use your "Rest" value to increase or decrease your score. "Up", "Down", and "Jump" move your pawn.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_4_text: "Reversus" and "Reversus Total" cards are more complex and can turn the game around. You'll learn their power in practice.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_5_text: Enough talk. Let's play. Don't think about winning, just about learning the rules.
story_dialogue.tutorial_loss_text: It seems you're not ready yet. Remember, the goal is to learn. Let's try again.
story_dialogue.post_tutorial_text: And with that, we finish the tutorial... I hope you understood everything. Your first real challenge awaits.
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_intro_text: I'll tell you two secrets about Contravox to help you in your duel...
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_text: Since I'm nice I'll tell you... Contravox is the weakest of the three... and he has a special ability... watch out for it!
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_option_1: Was that supposed to be a secret?
story_dialogue.post_contravox_victory_text: Incredible... you really defeated Contravox... now only two more to go, next is Versatrix, but be careful... not everything is as it seems.
story_dialogue.pre_versatrix_intro_text: Versatrix is a Gemini... and she is... valuable!
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_1: I have a feeling we've met in another life...
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_2: I don't want to lose... but if you beat me... I'll still help you...
story_dialogue.versatrix_solteira_text: Well... you opportunist, let's just duel!
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_victory_option_1: When I beat them... what happens?
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_defeat_text: Don't worry... I'll help you at the right time
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_defeat_option_1: I don't get it... I lost?
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_ask_return_text:
You are getting closer to returning to your world...
Defeat King Reversum and I will give you the chance to go back to your world
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_text: Two valuable pieces of information... he is the most powerful and he is immune to red!
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_option_1: Is this supposed to help me?
story_dialogue.start_reversum_text: I AM KING REVERSUM TOTEM! BOW BEFORE YOUR KING!
story_dialogue.start_reversum_option_2: I just want to finish the game...
story_dialogue.post_reversum_victory_text: Finally, with them defeated, the Inversus is mine.
story_dialogue.final_confrontation_1_text: I didn't lie, I will give you a chance to go back... however, if you defeat me.
story_dialogue.necroverso_king_battle_intro_text: Hahaha! Thanks to you, I have full control over the kings you defeated! And they will fight for me! But, to be fair, I'll explain the rules: in this combat, whoever has the lowest score in the round loses a heart. Lose them all... and you will be eliminated forever!
story_dialogue.post_necroverso_king_victory_text: You... defeated me? Impossible! For now, you are free. But know that this is not the end. I will be back...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_1_text: Wait! Before you face him, know this, he can't be beaten just by reaching the center of the board first... and don't let his darkness touch you...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_1_option_2: I don't know what to do...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_2_text: I will help you... together we will win!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_text: Two tips for you... your time is up and there's no escape!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_option_1: That didn't seem like a tip...
story_dialogue.xael_challenge_intro_text: So you accept my challenge! The rules here are different. The goal is to reach space 10 with MORE stars than me. Collect them on the board and use their effects wisely. Ready?
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_1: We did it! You defeated him!
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_3: Even if you defeat me... the Inversus... will never cease to exist.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_4: And with time... a new Necroverso will emerge.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_5: He's gone... for now. You saved us. Thank you.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_6: I think it's time for you to go home, isn't it? Or... if you want, you can stay. The choice is yours.

event_abilities.january_new: Can make a red path appear in front of him at the start of each round (50% chance).
event_abilities.february_new: Swaps 'Rest' cards with the opponent at the start of each round if it's favorable.
event_abilities.march_new: At the start of his turn, draws 2 value cards and discards 2, prioritizing keeping the highest values.
event_abilities.april_new: Once per turn, can ignore a negative effect played against him.
event_abilities.may_new: Plays his value and effect cards face down, revealing them only at the end of the round.
event_abilities.june_new: Can reuse an effect card that was used this round, once per round.
event_abilities.july_new: Has a chance (50%) to steal a random card from your hand per round.
event_abilities.august_new: Can swap places on the board with the opponent once per match.
event_abilities.september_new: Once per round, can peek at and swap a card from your hand with one of his.
event_abilities.october_new: Once per round (50% chance), can force everyone to discard the highest value card from their hands.
event_abilities.november_new: Once per round, can 'freeze' an opponent's effect card, preventing it from being played this round.
event_abilities.december_new: At the start of each round, he may swap hands with you (50% chance).
